title: Greenmachine - The archive of rotten blues (Japan Sludge/Hardcor
description:
www.metal-legions.com presents a darker Site of Torrents release


[quote]Greenmachine put out two albums on Man&#039;s Ruin Records in the late 1990s. They disbanded in 1999 but resurfaced in 2003 with The Archives of Rotten Blues on Diwphalanx Records. Diwphalanx also reissued the two Man&#039;s Ruin albums with bonus tracks in 2003. They played The Wizard&#039;s Convention in 2005 and are featured on the DVD along with fellow Japanese artists Boris, Church of Misery and Eternal Elysium. The band disbanded again in 2007 after the Wizard&#039;s Convention show, with their latest DVD release, This is the End, documenting their final show.[/quote]
[img]http://i142.photobucket.com/albums/r85/onekillwonder666/g1.jpg[/img]
Members
Datsu - drums 
Hasegawa - bass/vocals 
Monzawa - guitar/vocals 

Origin  Japan 
Genre Doom metal
         Stoner metal 
Years active 1995 - 1999
                  2003 - 2007 

Studio albums
D.A.M.N. CD (Man&#039;s Ruin Records 1997) 
The Earth Beater CD/10" (Man&#039;s Ruin Records 1999) 
The Archives of Rotten Blues CD (Diwphalanx Records 2004) 
Singles
Split 7" w/Thug (Bovine Records 1997) 
Reissue
D.A.M.N. +3 CD (Diwphalanx Records 2004) 
The Earth Beater +3 CD (Diwphalanx Records 2004) 
Live
Wizard&#039;s Convention: Japanese Heavy Rock Showcase DVD (Diwphalanx Records 2005) 
This Is the End 061008 DVD (Diwphalanx Records 2007) 

This band is really the shit. Starting as a Kuyss coverband they formed into something that kicks you in the balls with full force. 

Archives of Rotten Blues (2004)
Ripped in 320 kbps for your pleasure[/center]
